se.lnu.cs.doris.git

Class GitRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.lnu.cs.doris.git.GitRepository

  • public class GitRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to perform repository mining of git repositories. This file is a part of Doris Doris is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version. Doris is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with Doris. If not, see .
    Author:
    Emil Carlsson

        Constructor taking the uri flag value.

             java.lang.String target)
        Constructor taking the URI and target flags.

        uri - URI to the git repository's .git file.
        target - Path to target directory.

      • GitRepository

        public GitRepository(java.lang.String uri,
             java.lang.String target,
             java.lang.String startPoint)
        Constructor taking the URI, target and start point flags.
        Parameters:
        uri - URI to the git repository's .git file.
        target - Path to target directory.
        startPoint - SHA-1 checksum of the commit that is the starting point.

      • GitRepository

        public GitRepository(java.lang.String uri,
             java.lang.String target,
             java.lang.String startPoint,
             java.lang.String endPoint)
        Constructor taking the URI, target, start point flags and end point.
        Parameters:
        uri - URI to the git repository's .git file.
        target - Path to target directory.
        startPoint - SHA-1 checksum of the commit that is the starting point.
        endPoint - SHA-1 checksum of the commit that is the end point.

      • GitRepository

        public GitRepository(java.lang.String uri,
             java.lang.String target,
             java.lang.String startPoint,
             java.lang.String endPoint,
             java.lang.String limit)
        Constructor taking the URI, target, start point flags and end point.
        Parameters:
        uri - URI to the git repository's .git file.
        target - Path to target directory.
        startPoint - SHA-1 checksum of the commit that is the starting point.
        endPoint - SHA-1 checksum of the commit that is the end point.
        limit - Number of commits to be mined.

      • GitRepository

        public GitRepository(java.lang.String uri,
             java.lang.String target,
             java.lang.String startPoint,
             java.lang.String endPoint,
             java.lang.String limit,
             java.lang.Boolean noLog)
        Constructor taking the URI, target, start point flags and end point.
        Parameters:
        uri - URI to the git repository's .git file.
        target - Path to target directory.
        startPoint - SHA-1 checksum of the commit that is the starting point.
        endPoint - SHA-1 checksum of the commit that is the end point.
        limit - Number of commits to be mined.
        noLog - Boolean to set if a meta-data log should be created or not.

      • cleanupProject

        public static void cleanupProject(java.lang.String targetPath)
        Method to clean up after a project have been downloaded. Due to file locks this need to be performed after the mining is done.
        Parameters:
        targetPath - Path to the repository just mined.
